name: Secret Santa (itch) (Safriaduo)
description:
Secret Santa is a multiplayer First Person Shooter for 2 to 5 players. (1 vs 4)

At the start of each round, a player is randomly selected to embody the mighty SANTA KLAUS, equipped with his signature weapon... the Minigun!
Santa's goal is to retrieve the Winter Star and take it to his sleigh, and not be killed while doing it!

The other players will play as the Gremlins, very fast little devils that have to kill Santa! They are equipped with axes, crossbows, grenades and other terrifiying weapons, but be careful! Santa Klaus is not easy to kill!

To search for someone online that wants to play join our Discord: https://discord.gg/t8dE6dsVTd
